api_list.api_description: Perform a single search for a specific show by name.

query: Can you provide full details about the anime with ID 1, and also find the TV show named 'Breaking Bad'?

api_list.api_description: Provides weather forecast for a given location. You can request hourly, daily, and/or current weather data.

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Geographical WGS84 coordinates of the location.

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Geographical WGS84 coordinates of the location.

optional_parameters.name: hourly
optional_parameters.description: A list of weather variables which should be returned hourly.

optional_parameters.name: daily
optional_parameters.description: A list of daily weather variable aggregations which should be returned.

optional_parameters.name: current
optional_parameters.description: A list of weather variables to get current conditions.

optional_parameters.name: temperature_unit
optional_parameters.description: Temperature units like celsius or fahrenheit.

optional_parameters.name: wind_speed_unit
optional_parameters.description: Wind speed units like km/h, m/s, mph, or knots.

optional_parameters.name: precipitation_unit
optional_parameters.description: Precipitation units like mm or inch.

optional_parameters.name: timeformat
optional_parameters.description: Time format like iso8601 or unixtime.

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Timezone like GMT or location-based timezone.

optional_parameters.name: past_days
optional_parameters.description: Number of past days to include in the weather data.

optional_parameters.name: forecast_days
optional_parameters.description: Number of forecast days to include in the weather data.

query: What is the current temperature and wind speed forecast at a specific location (latitude=52.52, longitude=13.41) in Celsius and km/h? Additionally, provide a graphical weather forecast image for the same location.

api_list.api_description: Get the 10000 latest measurements for a sensor.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

required_parameters.name: sensor_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the sensor you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: from_date
optional_parameters.description: Beginning date of measurement data.

optional_parameters.name: to_date
optional_parameters.description: End date of measurement data.

query: Can you provide the weather forecast for Berlin, Germany with latitude=52.5200, longitude=13.4050 and also give me the latest 10000 measurements from a temperature sensor in a local senseBox with senseBox ID 57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c and sensor ID 57000b8745fd40c8196ad050?

api_list.api_description: Get all senseBoxes.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the search results.

query: What's the weather forecast for New York City today with latitude=40.7128, longitude=74.0060? Additionally, provide a list of senseBoxes located around the area.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a single senseBox.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format the sensor data is returned in.

query: Can you provide the latest weather measurements from a specific senseBox 57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c, and also give me a weather forecast for a location with coordinates 113.17 longitude and 23.09 latitude?

api_list.api_description: Compute basic descriptive statistics over specified time windows.

required_parameters.name: phenomenon
required_parameters.description: The name of the phenomenon you want to download the data for.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format in which data should be returned.

query: Check for any significant aviation weather hazards yesterday. Also, please provide descriptive statistics on temperature for the box ID '57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c', phenomenon 'Temperatur', from date '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z', to date '2023-01-31T23:59:59Z', with operation 'arithmeticMean' over a window of '1d'?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves machine-readable weather forecast data for a specified location.

optional_parameters.name: product
optional_parameters.description: Forecast product type ('astro', 'civil', 'civillight', 'meteo', or 'two')

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: Output format ('xml' or 'json')

query: I need to check for any international SIGMETs related to turbulence. Could you also provide a machine-readable forecast for Paris=48.8575° N, 2.3514° E, France=46.2276° N, 2.2137° E?

required_parameters.description: Geographical WGS84 coordinates of the location.

optional_parameters.name: hourly

query: What is the 7-day weather forecast for the location (latitude=52.52, longitude=13.41), including the maximum and minimum temperatures? Additionally, please provide machine-readable weather data for wind speed and temperature at this location.

api_list.api_description: Get the latest measurements of all sensors of the specified senseBox.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Number of measurements to be retrieved for every sensor.

query: I want to know the most recent environmental measurements for a senseBox 57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c. Also, can you provide me with a graphical weather forecast for a location at 113.17 longitude and 23.09 latitude?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves machine-readable weather forecast data for a specified location.

optional_parameters.name: product
optional_parameters.description: Forecast product type ('astro', 'civil', 'civillight', 'meteo', or 'two')

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: Output format ('xml' or 'json')

query: Can you provide the latest weather measurements from a specific senseBox 57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c, and also give me a weather forecast for a location with coordinates 113.17 longitude and 23.09 latitude?

api_list.api_description: Fetches decoded aviation weather observations (METAR).

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: Station ID(s).

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format.

optional_parameters.name: taf
optional_parameters.description: Include TAF information with the METAR.

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: Hours back to search.

optional_parameters.name: bbox
optional_parameters.description: Geographic bounding box.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Specific date to fetch records for.

query: What is the current METAR weather observation at JFK airport? Additionally, can I get a detailed weather forecast for the next week for New York City where latitude=40.730610 and longitude=-73.935242?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves an image-based weather forecast for a specified location using the graphical API.

optional_parameters.name: ac
optional_parameters.description: Altitude Correction, applicable in ASTRO

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: Unit system, either 'metric' or 'british'

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: Output format, 'internal' for graphical

optional_parameters.name: tzshift
optional_parameters.description: Timezone adjustment

api_list.response_format: Binary content of a PNG image

query: Can you provide the latest METAR report for the Kansas City airport? Additionally, I'd like a graphical weather forecast for the coordinates 38.97°N, 94.72°W.

api_list.api_description: Search by ingredient.

required_parameters.name: ingredient
required_parameters.description: The ingredient to filter cocktails by.

query: Find me cocktails that can be made using Gin and also list all the distilleries worldwide.

api_list.api_description: Get a random brewery.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Number of random breweries to return.

query: Can you suggest a random brewery in the United States that I can visit? Also, find some healthy food products with a good nutrition grade that I can enjoy along with the visit, and some bad ones that I should avoid using Open Food Facts.

api_list.api_description: Get product details by barcode.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve (comma-separated).

query: I need to find the nutritional details of this item using its barcode 3017624010701 and at the same time, could you provide me with data on whisky auctions from Catawiki?

api_list.api_description: Search cocktail by name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the cocktail to search for.

query: Can you tell me about a cocktail called 'Margarita' and also fetch the nutritional information for a product with barcode '3017624010701'?
